SEARCH
Package dataAccess

Interface DataAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryDatabase
public interface DataAccess
Represents all operations that may be performed on a database

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • clear

      void clear() throws DataAccessException
      Clears all the data in the database
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - for database or sql query violations

    • writeUser

      User writeUser(User user) throws DataAccessException
      Store a new user
      Parameters:
      user - (with both a username and an ID)
      Returns:
      the new user
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - for database (ex duplicate user creation) or sql query violations

    • readUser

      User readUser(User user) throws DataAccessException
      Read a previously stored user
      Parameters:
      user - (with both a username and an ID)
      Returns:
      return the stored data for the user
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - for database (ex no user) or sql query violations

    • removeUser

      void removeUser(User user)

    • writeGame

      Game writeGame(Game game) throws DataAccessException
      Saves the Game
      Parameters:
      game - to be saved
      Returns:
      the game that was saved
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • readGame

      Game readGame(int gameID) throws DataAccessException
      Find a single game out of the saved games
      Parameters:
      gameID - of the game you are trying to find
      Returns:
      the game that was being searched for
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • readAllGame

      ArrayList<Game> readAllGame()
      Retrieves all the saved games
      Returns:
      all the saved games

    • updateGame

      Game updateGame(int gameID, String newName) throws DataAccessException
      Updates the string name of a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - of the game you want to change the name of
      newName - of the desired game
      Returns:
      the game being searched, showing the updated name
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • removeGame

      void removeGame(int gameID)
      Removes a single game from where it is saved
      Parameters:
      gameID - of the desired game to be destroyed

    • writeAuth

      Authtoken writeAuth(Authtoken authtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • readAuth

      Authtoken readAuth(Authtoken authtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • removeAuth

      void removeAuth(Authtoken authtoken)
